CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Telomir Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a pre-clinical-stage pharmaceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of TELOMIR-1, a novel small molecule being developed to function as an oral in situ therapeutic treatment for human stem cells. Its goal is to develop and commercialize new treatment options for age-related inflammatory conditions, with hemochromatosis as its initial clinical focus, and to thereafter expand the development of TELOMIR-1 to post-chemotherapy recovery as well as a broader range of other age-related inflammatory diseases and conditions such as osteoarthritis.
